context:
| 2019 % | 2018 % | 2017 %
--- | --- | --- | ---
Weighted average actuarial assumptions used at 31 March1: |  |  | 
Rate of inflation2 | 2.9 | 2.9 | 3.0
Rate of increase in salaries | 2.7 | 2.7 | 2.6
Discount rate | 2.3 | 2.5 | 2.6

paragraph 1: Actuarial assumptions
paragraph 2: The Groupâ€™s scheme liabilities are measured using the projected unit credit method using the principal actuarial assumptions set out below:
paragraph 3: Notes: 1 Figures shown represent a weighted average assumption of the individual schemes.
paragraph 4: 2 The rate of increases in pensions in payment and deferred revaluation are dependent on the rate of inflation.

qa.question: What does the Weighted average actuarial assumptions consist of?
qa.answer: ['Rate of inflation', 'Rate of increase in salaries', 'Discount rate']
